statements: UPDATE job_descriptions SET job_title = 'Software Engineer', job_description = 'Develops software applications', qualifications = 'Bachelor's degree in Computer Science', date_posted = '2022-10-01' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
